rules: Every pizza has a PizzaBase and at least one topping.
VegetarianPizza must not have any MeatTopping or SeafoodTopping.
Pizzas can be classified as vegetarian or non-vegetarian depending on their toppings.
All cheese toppings are a type of CheeseTopping.
MozzarellaTopping is a kind of CheeseTopping.
